title: Accrue 10,000 dSolar
description: Push the boundaries of energy production! To complete this quest, have at least 10,000 dSolar in your inventory.

dialogue.text: You're doing great so far, generating a substantial amount of solar energy! Your next milestone is a whopping 10,000 dSolar. This might seem like a steep jump, but I believe in your potential. Onwards, to a brighter future!

Impressive, you've truly outdone yourself! I knew you had it in you. But remember, the sky is the limit, or in our case, the sun. I'll return with a greater challenge soon. Keep up the energy production!
